short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows current Bitcoin value in USD, EUR, and GBP

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bitcoin Now is a Chrome Extension which shows the current Bitcoin value in USD, EUR, and GBP. You can easily toggle between the currencies, and get the most updated value in one click. Bitcoin Now works with Coindesk data, to bring you the most accurate Bitcoin value in real time.
